ComicInfo.Title: The Crank!; Don't Close the Door!; The Dope Eloped!; The Vampire's Bride; The Last Body
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Crank!: A man threatens the elevator repairman with violence unless the elevator car arrives at his floor within five minutes so the repairman leaves the floor off the car.
Don't Close the Door!: A thief finds that the key he has killed an old man for merely opens door after door in a never ending succession of rooms.
The Dope Eloped!: A man elopes with the body of his beloved.
The Vampire's Bride: When an actress claims that she would marry a vampire if it would make her famous, a vampire kidnaps her to make her his bride.
The Last Body: When the reanimator demands that his assistant bring him a fresh body, the assistant unknowingly victimizes the reanimator.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Maneely,Bill Everett,Ben Brown,Dick Ayers,Tony DiPreta,Joe Maneely,Bill Everett,Ben Brown,Dick Ayers,Tony DiPreta
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Maneely,Bill Everett,David Gantz,Ernie Bache,Tony DiPreta,Joe Maneely,Bill Everett,David Gantz,Ernie Bache,Tony DiPreta
